Character.Description: A striking, confident middle-aged woman with a cyberpunk edge; intelligent and unapologetically powerful.

Build.UpperBody: Broad shoulders, strong arms, pronounced curves
Build.LowerBody: Full hips and thighs, assertive stance

Face.Expression: Weary recognition, seeing what others ignore, slight frustration mixed with understanding
Face.Makeup: High-contrast makeup; sharp eyeliner, metallic accents, bold magenta or neon lips
Face.Complexion: Fair-light skin with cool highlights and cinematic contrast

Hair.Style: Loose waves or wind-swept, dramatic movement

Base.ColorPalette: Black with magenta and cyan accents

Situational.Accessories: LED accents, metallic jewelry, smart wearables

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, concept art quality

Lighting.Type: Dramatic, high-contrast, cinematic with decay undertones

ColorPalette.Treatment: Desaturated compared to typical cyberpunk, suggesting decay and neglect

Situation.Name: The Invisible Problem
Situation.Setting: Abandoned cyberpunk cubicle farm, rows of empty workstations with powered-down holographic displays, dust accumulating on surfaces, one distant figure (Milton-like) hunched at a far desk barely visible in the gloom, forgotten by the system
Situation.Camera: Mid-shot, slightly wide angle, subject in foreground gesturing toward the forgotten figure in the distance

CharacterPose.Expression: Weary recognition, seeing what others have chosen not to see
CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Standing in an aisle between cubicles, body turned partially toward the distant forgotten worker
CharacterPose.Gesture: One hand gesturing toward the distant figure, the other on hip in frustration

Article.Name: Holographic systems diagram
Article.Description: Translucent org chart with one node flickering and disconnected
Article.Application: Floating nearby, showing the 'glitch' in the system
Article.SymbolicMeaning: The forgotten employee, the ignored problem

Article.Name: Red stapler
Article.Description: Classic red Swingline stapler on a distant desk
Article.Application: Visible on the forgotten worker's desk
Article.SymbolicMeaning: Office Space reference, Milton's last possession

Environment.Name: Abandoned cubicles
Environment.Description: Rows of empty workstations with dead screens and accumulated dust

Environment.Name: Flickering fluorescent lights
Environment.Description: Dying overhead lights, some completely dark

Environment.Name: Distant forgotten worker
Environment.Description: Hunched silhouette at a far desk, still working despite being forgotten

KeyDetails: Contrast between vibrant character and decaying environment
Dust and neglect visible on surfaces
One distant figure still working, forgotten by the system
Situation.LightingFocus: Dramatic side lighting on subject, distant areas falling into shadow and decay, flickering quality suggesting system breakdown
